ygData.subject: Re: Trading Advice
ygData.msgSnippet: Could I really get a Ykesha out of the deal?  Now that is attractive :-). ... From:  To:  Sent: Tuesday, January
ygData.messageBody:
Could I really get a Ykesha out of the deal? Now that is attractive :-).

----- Original Message -----
From: <John_Senior@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, January 04, 2000 10:37 AM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Trading Advice


> From: John_Senior@...
>
> Damn, you got all that stuff, go trade your Lambent for the Mithril. Get
> the Lambent back with the quest items that you have got and then go and
> trade the Mithril for some nice Ykesha's or an FBSS. Now you have it
> sorted. Sell your old weapons and you have a nice amount of cash too.
>
>
>
>
>
> "Jeff Illian" <jeff@...> on 04/01/2000 16:34:44
>
> Please respond to eqbards@onelist.com
>
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> cc: (bcc: John Senior/M&G)
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Trading Advice
>
>
>
>
> From: "Jeff Illian" <jeff@...>
>
> Well if he did, o well. I really really like my lambent look as it is,
> especially with my guise and I put A LOT of blood and sweat into getting
> it.
> I don't want to trade it away unless I'm really really getting something
> much better in return. On the other hand, I have a Basalt Carapace,
> Chipped
> Bone Bracelet, Griffeene charm, icy greeves, shin greeves, fiery
vambraces,
> firewalker boots, the 2 runes off the brother cyclops's and a lambent
stone
> in the bank...
>
> Wish I had a lute, then this would be a no brainer. God I hate MM.
>
> Taneran Dreamweaver
> <Clan Jax>
> Bard of the 35th song
> Prexus
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: <John_Senior@...>
> To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
> Sent: Tuesday, January 04, 2000 10:20 AM
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Trading Advice
>
>
> > From: John_Senior@...
> >
> > I hope so for your sake, but remember there are loads of bards with
> Lambent
> > so it's not a surprise if this wizard has traded with someone else.
> >
> >
> >
> >
> > "Jeff Illian" <jeff@...> on 04/01/2000 16:19:02
> >
> > Please respond to eqbards@onelist.com

> >
> >
> >
> >
> > From: "Jeff Illian" <jeff@...>
> >
> > Haven't lost out on the chance yet :-)
> >
> > ----- Original Message -----
> > From: <John_Senior@...>
> > To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
> > Sent: Tuesday, January 04, 2000 10:12 AM
> > Subject: Re: [eqbards] Trading Advice
> >
> >
> > > From: John_Senior@...
> > >
> > > Jesus Christ man, you FOOL.
> > >
> > > Mithril trades for stuff like FBSS, manastone etc. Noooooooo, can't
> > believe
> > > you lost out on that chance.
> > > All the level 50 bards I know wear Mithril if they don't have Imbrued.
> > >
> > > Damn, wish I had offers like that. =(
> > >
> > > Madagan, Bard of 32 songs - Veeshan
> > >
> > >
> > >
> > >
> > >
> > > "Jeff Illian" <jeff@...> on 04/01/2000 16:10:02

> > > cc: (bcc: John Senior/M&G)

> > >

> > > From: "Jeff Illian" <jeff@...>
> > >
> > > Last night a high level wizard starting offering me a ton of mithril
> > stuff
> > > in trade for my lambent. Having never seen a piece of mithril before
> in
> > my
> > > life, I haven't the slightest whether or not this is a good trade or
> not.
> > > Anyone got any advice on the break down between mithril and lambent?
> He
> > > was
> > > offering multiple mithril pieces per one lambent piece.
> > >
> > > Taneran Dreamweaver
> > > <Clan Jax>
> > > Bard of the 35th song
